ygData.subject: Re: Optional locations
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Check out this screenshot from the defunct emuQ webpage. After you pick up your jaw from the floor, look at what he has in his range and ammo slot.
ygData.messageBody:
>I was really hopeing it would yield tinkering info because Tergon says he
>shot bugglepup with one of his contraptions. (a tinker made shotgun of
>some
>sort??) :) Anyone ever finish all of Tergon's quests to the end?

Check out this screenshot from the defunct emuQ webpage. After you pick up
your jaw from the floor, look at what he has in his range and ammo slot.

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/poorguy.jpg

That means that the graphics for the guns are at least in the game =)

mmmmmmm... guns

Catbik Tinkerton AKA The Terminator
